lead_paragraph: This summer's Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro could offer a last grab at glory for a handful of veteran U.S. athletes who say that mental toughness and refined approaches to training are allowing them to perform at a top level late in their careers.

headline.main: Veteran U.S. Olympians Ready for Possible Last Grasps at Gold
headline.print_headline: Veteran U.S. Olympians Ready for Possible Last Grasps at Gold

snippet: This summer's Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro could offer a last grab at glory for a handful of veteran U.S. athletes who say that mental toughness and refined approaches to training are allowing them to perform at a top level late in their career...
